phrases: Menma's Search Party to commemorate the end of summer.
Let us get everyone together to enjoy a barbecue out on a cool evening.
We can talk lots about Menma's wish.
We still do not know the name of the flower we saw that day.
kimi to korogasu tsukaisute no jitensha
umi wo miwatasu saka wo kakenobotte
souyatte i am about to wa boku no hou e
mada futari wa sugu soko ni irunoni
Upon pages and pages of entries
We have put down all our emotions
But now I have hit a writer's block
I do not know how to finish this page anymore
Putting a bookmark in my diary
You and I go out to ride the bike we found in the dumpster
Let us go to our secret place
Where we piled up our bricks of memories
Run up the hill, where we can see the horizon
Where we can see the sky so fearfully blue
With cider in my right hand
My other hand helps me search for you
You used to come find me way back when
You used to demand me of so much more
You are both still standing right by my side
Yet why do I pray to see you both again?
There must be something off with me
kaerimichi no kousaten de koe wo kaketekureta ne
ureshikute tanoshikute bouken mo iro iro shita ne
futari no himitsu no kichi no naka
kimi to natsu no owari shourai no yume ookina kibou wasurenai
jyuunen no ato hachigatsu mata deaeru no wo shinjite
kimi ga saigo made kokoro kara arigatou sakendeita koto shitetayo
We met in an unexpected moment
when you called out to me at the crosswalk,
We shared so many happy times and thrilling adventures
I will never forget the hopes and dreams we shared during that one summer's end.
I am sure we will meet again in another August, in maybe ten years time.
I could feel your heartfelt thanks all the way until the end.
And I know it must have been painful
to hold back your tears and say goodbye with a smile.
But those are my best memories.
I am off to work then.
Why is not he nagging me about it?
But I guess I prefer it this way.
No, it would be better if he did nag me.
You have to go to school!
You have to pay Anaru back!
I helped you collect all the Nokemon, so you cannot break your promise.
That might be my wish - having you go to school.
Is that what this is all about?
She suddenly appeared in front of me.
She pushed some senseless request onto me.
She is the beast of summer.
I think I want to have my wish granted.
It is actually early fall going by the calendar, but the beast of summer has stayed in my house.
B-But it is not because you told me to.
Wow, you really came to school!
Nobody cares that you skipped a semester.
Or rather, nobody cared about you in the first place.
The power of love is really something.
This is all because you went to his house.
Who would want a guy like...
If it was not for the heat getting to my head,
I would never have bothered coming to this idiot zoo they call a school.
He is going home after all.
Hey, was that supposed to be an insult?
Let us see, how about this room.
She was way prettier in person.
I do not really like the picture my family has of me either.
But I always made the'peace' sign when I got my photo taken,
so there probably were not any normal photos of me.
I am dead too, but right now I am doing well.
Jintan will get angry at me.
It has nothing to do with my promise to Anaru.
Menma, my hallucination, is telling me to go to school.
That means somewhere inside of me, I...
You have to go to school!
I am getting pretty awesome myself.
It was a miracle of timing.
I made a miraculous curved shape with my piss!
And then it was like... woah, a triangle!
Are you sure you did not mistake something else for her?
I have got the eyesight of an Ottoman.
That white one-piece dress that she often wore during the summer.
Menma came back to have her wish granted, right?
I will get serious and put all my effort into figuring it out.
It is my turn to make dinner.
All we had today was the opening ceremony, so school was out early.
What have you been up to?
I applied my home ec knowledge!
Look at the mess you have made...
Everyone wants to eat your muffins.
The ones your mom made were tastier.
Maybe it is because I did not have any raisins.
I will practice more and more, and I will make them even tastier!
Do you plan on staying here forever?
That is not really the issue.
By the way, did you go over to Poppo's place too?
I do not know what you are talking about.
I have been at home this whole time.
But he said he saw you.
So what does that make you?
It does not really matter whether you are a ghost or not.
There is egg she will in this.
Ummm... that is for the calcium!
I have things to do too you know.
So you still keep in touch with him.
Are you looking for a present?
We have a wide selection, so please take your time.
You are always taking me places like this.
We do not have a subscription.
Menma's Search Party to commemorate the end of summer.
Menma, a cool evening and a barbecue.
I do not see the point of this.
Anyway, you have to be there.
I want to search for me too!
So what are you going to bring?
I never said I was going.
This might be the wish I wanted to be granted.
I might have wanted to see my own ghost.
You are good at making wishes that fit the situation.
Let us go to karaoke on the way home.
Hey, are you sure mini-sausages are enough for a barbecue?
This is all I had in the fridge that I could bring.
Let us go together with her.
Let us all get along and go as a group.
He made such a scene falling down.
We are going to the same place anyway.
She looks so cute with a ponytail.
Poppo, you called Tsuruk... Tsurumi too?
Did not you read the ad I gave you?
When I wrote everyone, I meant everyone.
You might mean everyone, but Yukiatsu probably will not show.
He does not seem like he believes in stuff like this.
Raise that a bit higher, Jintan.
What do you think of this grill?
I borrowed it from the old man at my job.
What are we going to grill?
Are not we going to summon Menma?
I thought we would need some props appropriate for a ghost story.
So what about food for the barbecue?
Oh, I do not eat much at night, so do not worry about me.
All Tsuruko thinks of is herself.
Selfish women turn me on, y'know.
I thought everyone else would bring food.
I did not want to bring the same thing.
I ate it when I went to India.
It is sweetened rice cooked in milk.
So this is not for a barbecue either.
Want to try frying it like okonomiyaki?
Let us stick to the sausages.
It just did not feel right without a fire.
This is quite the party we got here.
It is been so many years.
How do you make crabs again?
We are just like this charcoal.
It was originally made by burning wood.
Even if it does not light up right away,
once it remembers it is past it roars ablaze.
But all we have are sausages.
And I already made cuts in them.
Menma used to wear one often.
It is just like you said.
I always was, and I still am.
And even though it is like Menma, she would not wear one with such a high cut.
My friends from school wear ones like this, but they probably would not pick a white one.
I actually do put some thought into what I wear you know.
It is just that I end up going with the flow...
And in general, I do think a lot...
What do you hope to gain by telling me this?
Do you want me to say, Is that so.
I wanted someone get on my case
for always going along with what is happening around me.
It is a crab, a crab!
I did not think it would be so good.
It is almost like a dessert.
Yeah, you will help us out too will not you?
I think it is OK to believe in it.
Hey Jintan, the Super Peace Busters...
The Super Peace Busters are the best!
It is been a while since I have heard that name.
Well, I guess we never did retire.
With things the way they are, do you think maybe Menma will get nostalgic too and suddenly come back?
And some herbal salt and olive oil.
You are so unlike a certain useless woman here...
But you really scared me there.
I saw Menma a little earlier.
Looks like it was not just you.
If everyone is around... it is fun.
